description: Rangers defender linked with Dutch move, Fin Robertson makes case at Dundee and ex-Celtic star tipped to return.
title: Propper linked with Dutch return - Scottish gossip
title_page: Rangers' Robin Propper linked with Dutch return - Scottish gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Rangers defender Robin Propper, 31, is linked with a return to his native Netherlands this summer. (Sun), external
Fin Robertson, 22, is eager to take over from Lyall Cameron, 22, at Dundee when the midfielder moves to Rangers at the end of the season. (Record), external
Celtic winger Jota, 26, expects to improve for next season and be formidable as "Jota 2.0". (Herald - subscription required), external
Former Celtic player Peter Grant believes Brighton and Hove Albion midfielder Matt O'Riley, 24, could return to Celtic Park this summer. (Record), external
Hibernian midfielder Joe Newell, 32, may not play again this season. (Scotsman - subscription required), external
Dundee United wide man Will Ferry, 24, is walking a suspension tightrope as the season-defining run-in approaches. (Courier - subscription required), external
Qualifying for Europe will not define Hearts' summer transfer business, says head coach Neil Critchley. (Edinburgh Evening News - subscription required), external
Barry Douglas, 35, says St Johnstone are adopting a "nothing to lose" attitude in their fight against relegation. (Courier - subscription required), external
